entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 04:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
